item.description:
In reply to <a href="/censys/blog/burning-reduction-methods/my-air-conditioner-failed-so-this-week-it-is-personal/comment-page-1/#comment-17051">Bill Carroll</a>.
i know that you replied 2 years ago and i do not know if this will get to you but thanks so much for your comments...i did not know that people could comment without my approval or even my notification...so thanks again for your very good points...
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Bill Carroll.

i know that you replied 2 years ago and i do not know if this will get to you but thanks so much for your comments…i did not know that people could comment without my approval or even my notification…so thanks again for your very good points…
